channel.title: Rackham Vale! A zine that is so much more than a Zine! For OSE/OSR
channel.description: Has anyone here seen or read Rackham Vale yet?? Check out the reviews and let me know if you're interested. We are going to start offering to guest DM live plays, which will be EPIC!! Here's the link to one of the reviews from Questing Beast. We'd love your feedback and if you're interested in having us guest DM a live play, hit me up! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WmbF0AaaIJA

Has anyone here seen or read Rackham Vale yet?? Check out the reviews and let me know if you’re interested. We are going to start offering to guest DM live plays, which will be EPIC!!
